channel.title: Terri LvL 3
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Terri LvL 3"

item.title: Re: Terri LvL 3
item.content:encoded: A member of the Random boards with StI said he set his crank to level 3 and does not even see the message so it seems season 3+ is the requirement.

item.title: Re: Terri LvL 3
item.content:encoded:
I'll actually be testing that out a few weeks from nowâ€¦if a S2er with StI can use Crank 3 to level her. I really want to, since only S2 stuff was mentioned in the annoucement.

If you're S3+ with Terri lvl 2 and don't see the leveling text, though, set your Crank to 3 and try again. If you still don't see it, maybe you should double check what you have.

item.title: Re: Terri LvL 3
item.content:encoded: Crank level doesn't matter. You have to be S3+ to get her

item.title: Terri LvL 3
item.content:encoded: What level does your crank have to be on to level her?
